verses.verse: And it came<WH1961> to pass on the day<WH3117> that Moses<WH4872> had fully<WH3615> set<WH6965> up the tabernacle,<WH4908> and had anointed<WH4886> it, and sanctified<WH6942> it, and all<WH3605> the instruments<WH3627> thereof, both the altar<WH4196> and all<WH3605> the vessels<WH3627> thereof, and had anointed<WH4886> them, and sanctified<WH6942> them;

That the princes<WH5387> of Israel,<WH3478> heads<WH7218> of the house<WH1004> of their fathers,<WH1> who<WH1992> were the princes<WH5387> of the tribes,<WH4294> and were over<WH5975> them that were numbered,<WH6485> offered:<WH7126>

And they brought<WH935> their offering<WH7133> before<WH6440> the LORD,<WH3068> six<WH8337> covered<WH6632> wagons,<WH5699> and twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> oxen;<WH1241> a wagon<WH5699> for two<WH8147> of the princes,<WH5387> and for each one an ox:<WH7794> and they brought<WH7126> them before<WH6440> the tabernacle.<WH4908>
And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

Take<WH3947> it of them, that they may be to do<WH5647> the service<WH5656> of the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation;<WH4150> and you shall give<WH5414> them to the Levites,<WH3881> to every man<WH376> according<WH6310> to his service.<WH5656>
And Moses<WH4872> took<WH3947> the wagons<WH5699> and the oxen,<WH1241> and gave<WH5414> them to the Levites.<WH3881>
Two<WH8147> wagons<WH5699> and four<WH702> oxen<WH1241> he gave<WH5414> to the sons<WH1121> of Gershon,<WH1647> according<WH6310> to their service:<WH5656>

And four<WH702> wagons<WH5699> and eight<WH8083> oxen<WH1241> he gave<WH5414> to the sons<WH1121> of Merari,<WH4847> according<WH6310> to their service,<WH5656> under the hand<WH3027> of Ithamar<WH385> the son<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175> the priest.<WH3548>

But to the sons<WH1121> of Kohath<WH6955> he gave<WH5414> none:<WH3808> because<WH3588> the service<WH5656> of the sanctuary<WH6944> belonging to them was that they should bear<WH5375> on their shoulders.<WH3802>

And the princes<WH5387> offered<WH7126> for dedicating<WH2598> of the altar<WH4196> in the day<WH3117> that it was anointed,<WH4886> even the princes<WH5387> offered<WH7126> their offering<WH7133> before<WH6440> the altar.<WH4196>
And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> They shall offer<WH7126> their offering,<WH7133> each<WH259> prince<WH5387> on his day,<WH3117> for the dedicating<WH2598> of the altar.<WH4196>
And he that offered<WH7126> his offering<WH7133> the first<WH7223> day<WH3117> was Nahshon<WH5177> the son<WH1121> of Amminadab,<WH5992> of the tribe<WH4294> of Judah:<WH3063>

And his offering<WH7133> was one<WH259> silver<WH3701> charger,<WH7086> the weight thereof was an hundred<WH3967> and thirty<WH7970> shekels, one<WH259> silver<WH3701> bowl<WH4219> of seventy<WH7657> shekels,<WH8255> after the shekel<WH8255> of the sanctuary; both<WH8147> of them were full<WH4392> of fine flour<WH5560> mingled<WH1101> with oil for a meat offering:<WH4503>
One<WH259> spoon<WH3709> of ten<WH6235> shekels of gold,<WH2091> full<WH4392> of incense:<WH7004>
One<WH259> young<WH1121> <WH1241> bullock,<WH6499> one<WH259> ram,<WH352> one<WH259> lamb of the first<WH1121> year,<WH8141> for a burnt<WH5930> offering:
One<WH259> kid<WH8163> of the goats<WH5795> for a sin<WH2403> offering:

And for a sacrifice<WH2077> of peace offerings, two<WH8147> oxen,<WH1241> five<WH2568> rams, five<WH2568> he goats,<WH6260> five<WH2568> lambs of the first<WH1121> year:<WH8141> this<WH2088> was the offering<WH7133> of Nahshon<WH5177> the son<WH1121> of Amminadab.<WH5992>
On the second<WH8145> day<WH3117> Nethaneel<WH5417> the son<WH1121> of Zuar,<WH6686> prince<WH5387> of Issachar,<WH3485> did offer:<WH7126>

He offered<WH7126> for his offering<WH7133> one<WH259> silver<WH3701> charger,<WH7086> the weight whereof was an hundred<WH3967> and thirty<WH7970> shekels, one<WH259> silver<WH3701> bowl<WH4219> of seventy<WH7657> shekels,<WH8255> after the shekel<WH8255> of the sanctuary; both<WH8147> of them full<WH4392> of fine flour<WH5560> mingled<WH1101> with oil for a meat offering:<WH4503>
One<WH259> spoon<WH3709> of gold<WH2091> of ten<WH6235> shekels, full<WH4392> of incense:<WH7004>
One<WH259> young<WH1121> <WH1241> bullock,<WH6499> one<WH259> ram,<WH352> one<WH259> lamb of the first<WH1121> year,<WH8141> for a burnt<WH5930> offering:
One<WH259> kid<WH8163> of the goats<WH5795> for a sin<WH2403> offering:

And for a sacrifice<WH2077> of peace offerings, two<WH8147> oxen,<WH1241> five<WH2568> rams, five<WH2568> he goats,<WH6260> five<WH2568> lambs of the first<WH1121> year:<WH8141> this<WH2088> was the offering<WH7133> of Nethaneel<WH5417> the son<WH1121> of Zuar.<WH6686>
On the third<WH7992> day<WH3117> Eliab<WH446> the son<WH1121> of Helon,<WH2497> prince<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Zebulun,<WH2074> did offer:

His offering<WH7133> was one<WH259> silver<WH3701> charger,<WH7086> the weight whereof was an hundred<WH3967> and thirty<WH7970> shekels, one<WH259> silver<WH3701> bowl<WH4219> of seventy<WH7657> shekels,<WH8255> after the shekel<WH8255> of the sanctuary; both<WH8147> of them full<WH4392> of fine flour<WH5560> mingled<WH1101> with oil for a meat offering:<WH4503>

One<WH259> kid<WH8163> of the goats<WH5795> for a sin<WH2403> offering:

And for a sacrifice<WH2077> of peace offerings, two<WH8147> oxen,<WH1241> five<WH2568> rams, five<WH2568> he goats,<WH6260> five<WH2568> lambs of the first<WH1121> year:<WH8141> this<WH2088> was the offering<WH7133> of Eliab<WH446> the son<WH1121> of Helon.<WH2497>
On the fourth<WH7243> day<WH3117> Elizur<WH468> the son<WH1121> of Shedeur,<WH7707> prince<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Reuben,<WH7205> did offer:

His offering<WH7133> was one<WH259> silver<WH3701> charger<WH7086> of the weight<WH4948> of an hundred<WH3967> and thirty<WH7970> shekels, one<WH259> silver<WH3701> bowl<WH4219> of seventy<WH7657> shekels,<WH8255> after the shekel<WH8255> of the sanctuary; both<WH8147> of them full<WH4392> of fine flour<WH5560> mingled<WH1101> with oil for a meat offering:<WH4503>
One<WH259> golden<WH2091> spoon<WH3709> of ten<WH6235> shekels, full<WH4392> of incense:<WH7004>
One<WH259> young<WH1121> <WH1241> bullock,<WH6499> one<WH259> ram,<WH352> one<WH259> lamb of the first<WH1121> year,<WH8141> for a burnt<WH5930> offering:
One<WH259> kid<WH8163> of the goats<WH5795> for a sin<WH2403> offering:

And for a sacrifice<WH2077> of peace offerings, two<WH8147> oxen,<WH1241> five<WH2568> rams, five<WH2568> he goats,<WH6260> five<WH2568> lambs of the first<WH1121> year:<WH8141> this<WH2088> was the offering<WH7133> of Elizur<WH468> the son<WH1121> of Shedeur.<WH7707>
On the fifth<WH2549> day<WH3117> Shelumiel<WH8017> the son<WH1121> of Zurishaddai,<WH6701> prince<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Simeon,<WH8095> did offer:

His offering<WH7133> was one<WH259> silver<WH3701> charger,<WH7086> the weight<WH4948> whereof was an hundred<WH3967> and thirty<WH7970> shekels, one<WH259> silver<WH3701> bowl<WH4219> of seventy<WH7657> shekels,<WH8255> after the shekel<WH8255> of the sanctuary; both<WH8147> of them full<WH4392> of fine flour<WH5560> mingled<WH1101> with oil for a meat offering:<WH4503>

One<WH259> kid<WH8163> of the goats<WH5795> for a sin<WH2403> offering:

On the sixth<WH8345> day<WH3117> Eliasaph<WH460> the son<WH1121> of Deuel,<WH1845> prince<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Gad,<WH1410> offered:

His offering<WH7133> was one<WH259> silver<WH3701> charger<WH7086> of the weight<WH4948> of an hundred<WH3967> and thirty<WH7970> shekels, a silver<WH3701> bowl<WH4219> of seventy<WH7657> shekels,<WH8255> after the shekel<WH8255> of the sanctuary; both<WH8147> of them full<WH4392> of fine flour<WH5560> mingled<WH1101> with oil for a meat offering:<WH4503>

His offering<WH7133> was one<WH259> silver<WH3701> charger,<WH7086> the weight<WH4948> whereof was an hundred<WH3967> and thirty<WH7970> shekels, one<WH259> silver<WH3701> bowl<WH4219> of seventy<WH7657> shekels,<WH8255> after the shekel<WH8255> of the sanctuary; both<WH8147> of them full<WH4392> of fine flour<WH5560> mingled<WH1101> with oil for a meat offering:<WH4503>

One<WH259> kid<WH8163> of the goats<WH5795> for a sin<WH2403> offering:

On the eighth<WH8066> day<WH3117> offered Gamaliel<WH1583> the son<WH1121> of Pedahzur,<WH6301> prince<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Manasseh:<WH4519>

His offering<WH7133> was one<WH259> silver<WH3701> charger<WH7086> of the weight<WH4948> of an hundred<WH3967> and thirty<WH7970> shekels, one<WH259> silver<WH3701> bowl<WH4219> of seventy<WH7657> shekels,<WH8255> after the shekel<WH8255> of the sanctuary; both<WH8147> of them full<WH4392> of fine flour<WH5560> mingled<WH1101> with oil for a meat offering:<WH4503>

One<WH259> kid<WH8163> of the goats<WH5795> for a sin<WH2403> offering:

And for a sacrifice<WH2077> of peace offerings, two<WH8147> oxen,<WH1241> five<WH2568> rams, five<WH2568> he goats,<WH6260> five<WH2568> lambs of the first<WH1121> year:<WH8141> this<WH2088> was the offering<WH7133> of Gamaliel<WH1583> the son<WH1121> of Pedahzur.<WH6301>
On the ninth<WH8671> day<WH3117> Abidan<WH27> the son<WH1121> of Gideoni,<WH1441> prince<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Benjamin,<WH1144> offered:

His offering<WH7133> was one<WH259> silver<WH3701> charger,<WH7086> the weight<WH4948> whereof was an hundred<WH3967> and thirty<WH7970> shekels, one<WH259> silver<WH3701> bowl<WH4219> of seventy<WH7657> shekels,<WH8255> after the shekel<WH8255> of the sanctuary; both<WH8147> of them full<WH4392> of fine flour<WH5560> mingled<WH1101> with oil for a meat offering:<WH4503>

One<WH259> kid<WH8163> of the goats<WH5795> for a sin<WH2403> offering:

On the tenth<WH6224> day<WH3117> Ahiezer<WH295> the son<WH1121> of Ammishaddai,<WH5993> prince<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Dan,<WH1835> offered:

His offering<WH7133> was one<WH259> silver<WH3701> charger,<WH7086> the weight<WH4948> whereof was an hundred<WH3967> and thirty<WH7970> shekels, one<WH259> silver<WH3701> bowl<WH4219> of seventy<WH7657> shekels,<WH8255> after the shekel<WH8255> of the sanctuary; both<WH8147> of them full<WH4392> of fine flour<WH5560> mingled<WH1101> with oil for a meat offering:<WH4503>

One<WH259> kid<WH8163> of the goats<WH5795> for a sin<WH2403> offering:

On the eleventh<WH6249> <WH6240> day<WH3117> Pagiel<WH6295> the son<WH1121> of Ocran,<WH5918> prince<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Asher,<WH836> offered:

His offering<WH7133> was one<WH259> silver<WH3701> charger,<WH7086> the weight<WH4948> whereof was an hundred<WH3967> and thirty<WH7970> shekels, one<WH259> silver<WH3701> bowl<WH4219> of seventy<WH7657> shekels,<WH8255> after the shekel<WH8255> of the sanctuary; both<WH8147> of them full<WH4392> of fine flour<WH5560> mingled<WH1101> with oil for a meat offering:<WH4503>

On the twelfth<WH8147> <WH6240> day<WH3117> Ahira<WH299> the son<WH1121> of Enan,<WH5881> prince<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Naphtali,<WH5321> offered:

His offering<WH7133> was one<WH259> silver<WH3701> charger,<WH7086> the weight<WH4948> whereof was an hundred<WH3967> and thirty<WH7970> shekels, one<WH259> silver<WH3701> bowl<WH4219> of seventy<WH7657> shekels,<WH8255> after the shekel<WH8255> of the sanctuary; both<WH8147> of them full<WH4392> of fine flour<WH5560> mingled<WH1101> with oil for a meat offering:<WH4503>

One<WH259> kid<WH8163> of the goats<WH5795> for a sin<WH2403> offering:

And for a sacrifice<WH2077> of peace offerings, two<WH8147> oxen,<WH1241> five<WH2568> rams, five<WH2568> he goats,<WH6260> five<WH2568> lambs of the first<WH1121> year:<WH8141> this<WH2088> was the offering<WH7133> of Ahira<WH299> the son<WH1121> of Enan.<WH5881>

This<WH2063> was the dedication<WH2598> of the altar,<WH4196> in the day<WH3117> when it was anointed,<WH4886> by the princes<WH5387> of Israel:<WH3478> twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> chargers<WH7086> of silver,<WH3701> twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> silver<WH3701> bowls,<WH4219> twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> spoons<WH3709> of gold:<WH2091>

Each<WH259> charger<WH7086> of silver<WH3701> weighing an hundred<WH3967> and thirty<WH7970> shekels, each<WH259> bowl<WH4219> seventy:<WH7657> all<WH3605> the silver<WH3701> vessels<WH3627> weighed two thousand<WH505> and four<WH702> hundred<WH3967> shekels, after the shekel<WH8255> of the sanctuary:

The golden<WH2091> spoons<WH3709> were twelve,<WH8147> <WH6240> full<WH4392> of incense,<WH7004> weighing ten<WH6235> shekels apiece, after the shekel<WH8255> of the sanctuary:<WH6944> all<WH3605> the gold<WH2091> of the spoons<WH3709> was an hundred<WH3967> and twenty<WH6242> shekels.

All<WH3605> the oxen<WH1241> for the burnt<WH5930> offering were twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> bullocks,<WH6499> the rams<WH352> twelve,<WH8147> <WH6240> the lambs<WH3532> of the first<WH1121> year<WH8141> twelve,<WH8147> <WH6240> with their meat offering:<WH4503> and the kids<WH8163> of the goats<WH5795> for sin<WH2403> offering twelve.<WH8147>

And all<WH3605> the oxen<WH1241> for the sacrifice<WH2077> of the peace<WH8002> offerings were twenty<WH6242> and four<WH702> bullocks,<WH6499> the rams<WH352> sixty,<WH8346> the he goats<WH6260> sixty,<WH8346> the lambs<WH3532> of the first<WH1121> year<WH8141> sixty.<WH8346> This<WH2063> was the dedication<WH2598> of the altar,<WH4196> after<WH310> that it was anointed.<WH4886>

And when Moses<WH4872> was gone<WH935> into<WH413> the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150> to speak<WH1696> with him, then he heard<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of one speaking<WH1696> to him from off<WH5921> the mercy<WH3727> seat that was on the ark<WH727> of testimony,<WH5715> from between<WH996> the two<WH8147> cherubim:<WH3742> and he spoke<WH1696> to him.
